ChartType.description:
Chart type of the chart card.

In Android, scrolling is not supported for bar type and only two data series can be displayed. In iOS, scrolling is supported for bar type.

IsTrendUpward.description: Android only. Use `TrendImage` for iOS. Set `IsTrendUpward` to `true` for positive trend and is styled with color Green. Set `IsTrendUpward` to `false` for negative trend and is styled with color Red.

TrendTitle.description: In iOS, if `Subtitle` is also set, then `TrendTitle` will be ignored.

Subtitle.description: iOS only. If `Subtitle` is set, then `TrendTitle` will be ignored.

NoDataText.description: Placeholder text when chart data is not available. If this is absent, no text will be displayed when chart data is empty.

SeriesColor.description: Can be a hex string, e.g. #fcba03 or color string. e.g. blue. iOS only, it is not configurable in Android.

Data.description: Array of arrays containing specific data elements

CategoryTitles.description: `CategoryTitles` is compulsory, no fallback maintained; Android only renders even numbered array elements when specified; In iOS, `CategoryTitles` only displays first and last elements of the array; Number of values in `Data` and `CategoryTitles` must be the same for the last value of `CategoryTitles` to be displayed.

CategoryLabelVisible.description: iOS only. Whether to show the category label.

NumericLabelVisible.description: iOS only. Whether to show the numerical label.

DataSubscriptions.description: Array of data change events to subscribe to.

Target.description: Definition of the target binding to dynamically populate the collection. You can also set this to binding/rule to return an array of data items. Note: If this is set to binding/rule, you must return an array of data items, you can't return Target definition.

Title.description: The string value is a style class name of `Title`.

Subtitle.description: The string value is a style class name of `Subtitle`. iOS only.

StatusText.description: The string value is a style class name of `StatusText`.

SeriesTitle.description: The string value is a style class name of `SeriesTitle`. Can only be styled in iOS.

TrendTitle.description: The string value is a style class name of `TrendTitle`.

TrendImage.description: The string value is a style class name of `TrendImage`. iOS only.

NoDataText.description: The string value is a style class name of `NoDataText`. Android only. `font-typeface` attribute not supported.
